other_title: Dragon Ball Z: Fukkatsu no F (Japanese)
Dragon Ball Z: La resurrección de "F" (Spanish)
Dragon Ball Z: La Resurrección de Freezer (Spanish)
Dragon Ball Z: La Résurrection de F (French)
Dragon Ball Z: La resurrezione di 'F' (Italian)

ドラゴンボールZ 復活の「F」 (Japanese)
plot: Frieza is revived by two evil villains. He brings back his whole army with him. After training for four months in hell Frieza is now stronger than Mystic Gohan in his first form.
ending_theme: "'Z' no Chikai" (『Z』の誓い;The Oath of 'Z') by Momoiro Clover Z
